IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: NEVADA BALLET THEATRE PROMOTES AND DEVELOPS INTEREST IN DANCE AND RELATED ARTS IN THE LAS VEGAS VALLEY BY ORGANIZING, PROMOTING AND PROVIDING PROFESSIONAL DANCE PRODUCTIONS, PROVIDING RECREATIONAL AND PRE-PROFESSIONAL DANCE INSTRUCTION AND PROVIDING A VARIETY OF COMMUNITY EDUCATION AND OUTREACH PROGRAMS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: NEVADA BALLET THEATRE PROMOTES AND DEVELOPS INTEREST IN DANCE AND RELATED ARTS IN THE LAS VEGAS VALLEY BY ORGANIZING, PROMOTING AND PROVIDING PROFESSIONAL DANCE PRODUCTIONS, PROVIDING RECREATIONAL AND PRE-PROFESSIONAL DANCE INSTRUCTION AND PROVIDING A VARIETY OF COMMUNITY EDUCATION AND OUTREACH PROGRAMS.
IRS990.Desc: NEVADA BALLET THEATRE ORGANIZES, PROMOTES AND PRESENTS ABOUT 28 PERFORMANCES OVER 4 PROGRAMS WHICH INCLUDE MIXED REPERTORY BALLETS AS WELL AS FULL-LENGTH WORKS INCLUDING THE HOLIDAY CLASSIC, THE NUTCRACKER. WITH THE MAJORITY OF PROGRAMS TAKING PLACE AT THE WORLD-CLASS SMITH CENTER FOR THE PERFORMING ARTS, NEVADA BALLET THEATRE REACHES THOUSANDS OF COMMUNITY MEMBERS ANNUALLY. IN ADDITION, NEVADA BALLET THEATRE'S PROFESSIONAL FACILITY SERVES AS A REHEARSAL SPACE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE ACADEMY OF NEVADA BALLET THEATRE IS CONSIDERED THE FINEST SCHOOL FOR BALLET AND DANCE INSTRUCTION IN THE LAS VEGAS VALLEY AND IS THE ONLY BALLET SCHOOL AFFILIATED WITH A PROFESSIONAL BALLET COMPANY. REACHING MORE THAN 300 STUDENTS, THE ACADEMY OF NEVADA BALLET THEATRE PROVIDES BOTH PRE- PROFESSIONAL AND RECREATIONAL DANCE INSTRUCTION AND SHOWCASES ITS WORK THROUGH VARIOUS STUDENT RECITAL PROGRAMS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: NEVADA BALLET THEATRE'S COMMUNITY EDUCATION PROGRAM PROVIDES NOT ONLY DANCE EDUCATION PROGRAMS TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC, BUT FOCUSES ON PROVIDING DANCE INSTRUCTION FOR AT-RISK CHILDREN AT A VARIETY OF SCHOOLS AND OTHER LOCATIONS IN THE LAS VEGAS VALLEY. REACHING MORE THAN 20,000 STUDENTS ANNUALLY THROUGH A VARIETY OF INITIATIVES, THE DANCE INSTRUCTION PORTION OF THE PROGRAM CULMINATES IN ANNUAL RECITALS FEATURING MORE THAN 1,000 STUDENT PARTICIPANTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE G, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2B, COLUMN (V)
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HNF CONSULTING FEE PAID FOR FUNDRAISING

NEVADA BALLET THEATRE PROMOTES AND DEVELOPS INTEREST IN DANCE AND RELATED ARTS IN THE LAS VEGAS VALLEY BY ORGANIZING, PROMOTING AND PROVIDING PROFESSIONAL DANCE PRODUCTIONS, PROVIDING RECREATIONAL AND PRE-PROFESSIONAL DANCE INSTRUCTION AND PROVIDING A VARIETY OF COMMUNITY EDUCATION AND OUTREACH PROGRAMS.
RICHARD PLASTER MAGGIE PLASTER TRUSTEE TRUSTEE FATHER-IN-LAW
THE FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND APPROVES THE FORM 990 BEFORE IT IS SIGNED AND FILED WITH THE IRS.
INFORMATION IS SOLICITED FROM BOARD MEMBERS VIA A CONFIDENTIAL QUESTIONNAIRE. THIS QUESTIONNAIRE REQUESTS DISCLOSURE OF RELATIONSHIPS WHICH MAY PRESENT A CONFLICT OF INTEREST.
THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND RECOMMENDS A COMPENSATION PACKAGE AS MANAGED AND EXECUTED VIA EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT.
